Package org.obrel.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FluentRelatable<T extends FluentRelatable<T>>
    An interface that can be implemented by relatable objects that provide a fluent interface.
    ProvidesConfiguration
    An interface for object that provide access to relation-based configuration values.
    ProvidesSettings
    An interface for object that provide access to relation-based settings or preferences.
    Relatable
    This interface defines the public methods that are provided by related objects.
    RelatableMixin
    A Relatable sub-interface that can be used to provide relation support for existing classes that cannot inherit from RelatedObject.
    RelationBuilder<R extends RelationBuilder<R>>
    An interface for Relatable implementations that provides default methods for classes that need builder pattern relation setting methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotations
    Contains ObjectRelations-specific annotations.
    DirectRelation<T>
    A standard relation implementation which stores the target object directly.
    IntermediateRelation<T,I>
    A relation class that stores the target value in an intermediate format.
    ObjectRelations
    A class containing static methods for the handling of object relations.
    Params
    A subclass of related object that is intended to hold relation-based parameters.
    RelatedObject
    The base class for all relation-enabled objects.
    Relation<T>
    This is the abstract base class for relations from a certain origin object to a target object.
    RelationAlias<T,A>
    A relation wrapper implementation that wraps another relation with a different relation type with the same generic types.
    RelationData<T>
    A type-safe pair of a relation type and an associated value.
    RelationEvent<T>
    An element event subclass that contains information related to relation modifications.
    RelationType<T>
    Instances of this class define the type and behavior of relations.
    RelationTypes
    This is a factory class to create relation types with different target data types and parameters.
    RelationView<T,V>
    A relation wrapper implementation that provides a readonly view of another relation with a different relation type and datatype.
    RelationWrapper<T,R,F extends Function<R,T>>
    A wrapper for other relations that provides a view of the relation with a different relation type and optionally a different datatype.
    SerializableRelatedObject
    A related object subclass that implements the Serializable interface so that it can be serialized to a stream.
    TransformedRelation<T,D>
    A relation implementation that stores the target value in a transformed form.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RelationTypeModifier
    An enumeration of modifiers that define certain static aspects of relation types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnresolvableRelationException
    Runtime exception that signals an unresolvable relation.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Annotations.NoRelationNameCheck
    An annotation for relation type fields where the field name should not be checked for equality with the relation type name.
    Annotations.RelationTypeNamespace
    An annotation for classes that contains a different namespace for declared relation types than that of the declaring class.
